short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your pages look nice with one click! Round corners, add transitions, and add smooth scrolling!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your pages look nice with one click!
Features:
» Round corners of images, buttons, and elements on the page
